name: Lost Soul (Natzuup)
description:
Info

Starting in a dark cave surrounded by shady looking creatures, Zert is looking for his other half, his soul. Fighting his way through multiple level followed by a weird cat that somehow wont leave him alone. While roaming through the caves Zert sees glowing objects ... could that be keys? But for what.

Features
  • A very simple pixelart look
  • Explore and hunt down little mobs
  • Collect all keys
  • Find your lost soul
Movement
  • Move - A/D
  • Jump - Space
  • Attack - F
  • Interact - E
Feedback

The Game is still under development and can only get better with your feedback :)
